title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\TransformationSummary
name: TransformationSummary
description:
Summary of a single transformation.

Only one of 'transformation', 'field_transformation', or 'record_suppress' will be set.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.TransformationSummary

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.info_type
params.description: Set if the transformation was limited to a specific InfoType.

params.name: data.field
params.description: Set if the transformation was limited to a specific FieldId.

params.name: data.transformation
params.description: The specific transformation these stats apply to.

params.name: data.field_transformations
params.description: The field transformation that was applied. If multiple field transformations are requested for a single field, this list will contain all of them; otherwise, only one is supplied.

params.name: data.record_suppress
params.description: The specific suppression option these stats apply to.

params.name: data.results
params.description: Collection of all transformations that took place or had an error.

params.name: data.transformed_bytes
params.description: Total size in bytes that were transformed in some way.
